11.eng-name: The Book of the Commencement of the Prayer

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Ibn Umar said:"I watched the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ)- twenty times- reciting in the two rak'ahs after maghrib 'Say: O you disbelievers' and 'Say: He is Allah, (the) One

chapter.ara-name: باب الْقِرَاءَةِ فِي الرَّكْعَتَيْنِ بَعْدَ الْمَغْرِبِ
chapter.eng-name: Recitation in the two rak'ahs after maghrib
